review_details: We visited the Real Mary Kings Close. It was really interesting and fun! Our guide Mikaela was the best! Definitely you have to visit it!

We decided to go with Captain Andreas for a fishing tour... it was one of the best experiences that we had in Milos! We took a fishing course,then we visited the fantastic beaches of Polyaigos and after all,we cooked the fishes that we caught! Andreas is one of the best guys i have met in Milos! I would definitely suggest it!
